name: Lacrosse Spirits - Beta
description:
Lacrosse Spirits takes you on an adventure of a Native American Iroquois on his journey to become the best lacrosse player. Gather animal spirits to improve your skills, upgrade your stick and unlock your favorite pattern.

Features:
       - 4 levels
       - 4 sticks
       - 9 stick pattern
       - historical facts about the Iroquois
       - custimizable sticks
       - highscores
